name: Assassinate
description: For each turn in which you have not been dealt damage, deal 10% of your opponent's remaining hit points.

immediateEffect.script: int turnsWithoutDamage = Player.TurnsWithoutDamage; int damagePercent = turnsWithoutDamage * 10; int damage = (int)(Opponent.CurrentHP * damagePercent / 100); DealDamage(Opponent, damage);
